snippet: In delivering their verdicts in a notorious financial fraud case, the judges altered the charges, which the attorney general’s office called unacceptable.
abstract: Afghan attorney general's office plans to appeal verdicts in Kabul Bank fraud case, noting that judges altered charges that were originally filed by prosecutors, resulting in more lenient sentences.
lead_paragraph: In delivering their verdicts in a notorious financial fraud case, the judges altered the charges, which the attorney general’s office called unacceptable.

headline.seo: Officials Seek Tougher Sentences in Kabul Bank Case
headline.main: Officials Urge Tougher Line on Kabul Bank Case Verdicts
headline.print_headline: Officials Urge Tougher Line On Kabul Bank Case Verdicts
